description:
Drawing Cartoon Bat & Monkey in PowerPoint along with 7+ Other Diagrams - Updated Feb 1, 2016

What's the course about?

This PowerPoint course is about learning essential skills for drawing in PowerPoint and how to draw 10+ advanced diagrams in PowerPoint to expertise your drawing skills.

Simply the core concentration of this PowerPoint course is 'how to draw in PowerPoint'.

Thomas Dupacq says, "Very useful course on how to draw with MS Powerpoint. I really appreciated all the tips and tricks. I do recommend"

What kind of materials are included?

You're provided with all the PowerPoint Presentation (.pptx) files I used to create the course are provided as a resource in Introduction section, with which, you can parallely do all the practical PowerPoint tutorial lectures along with me.

Ruffett Ennel says, "Arun, helped me to create my block diagrams for my project report. he don't need to do that but i repect his knowledge and patience. i learnt how to draw block diagrams. as he said in the intro, i assure that his approach is the best. his practical lectures are icing on the cakes. i diidnt know that we can make a lamp glow in powerpoint. every science student must watch this."

How long will the course take to complete?

This entire PowerPoint course is just 2 hours. Make sure you listen to "Before you start the course" lecture in Section 1, to get the most benefit out of the course

You can finish Section 2 - Fundamentals of drawing in just over 30 mins.

New Section 3 and 4 added - Drawing a Cartoon Bat & Monkey in PowerPoint - 50 Mins.You can watch Section 5 & 6 in another 60 mins, but I recommend you to try those exercises along with me, to master your drawing skills in PowerPoint.

How is the course structured?

This course is effectively organized into 3 appropriate sections

1. Introduction - You will get an overview of the course and will come to know 'how to get the most benefit out of this course'

2. Fundamentals of drawing - In this section, you will get accustomed to all the essential skills and techniques that you will use to draw in PowerPoint. You also got a quiz with 17 questions, covering all the important techniques, taught in this section

3. Draw 7+ diagrams in PowerPoint - You will learn to apply those skills in 7+ awesome diagrams. This approach gives you the confidence as well as practice in learning and applying the skills. You won’t just watch this course; you will practice along with me. I will walk you through the process step by step. Also you got an exercise to test and show cast your newly acquired drawing skill in PowerPoint.

I designed this course for Teachers, students and book Writers, who often struggle to draw diagrams, which are essential for their content. By the end of the course You would have drawn 5 advanced, 2 dimensional diagrams in PowerPoint and you will be able to recreate any diagram that you see on a book or on a website. You don’t need to be an expert in PowerPoint to enroll, but a prior knowledge in PowerPoint will help you grasp the ideas faster
title: Drawing Course: How to Draw Easily in PowerPoint 2013
